https://tmrev.io/movie/983949-Be Inspired: The Life of Heavy D 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null He was known as The Overweight Lover, The Heavster, and Most Affectionately, Heavy D. Penned as one of the most likable people in Hip-Hop, he lived a life that was not only positive and enlightening as a performer, but also as a father and a friend. Be Inspired is a documentary chronicling the prolific life and career of Dwight "Heavy D" Myers. Be Inspired: The Life of Heavy D
